name: Knudde: World Sports Tournament
summary: Knudde: World Sports Tournament, based on Toon van Driel's 1973 comic strip, lets you play as Jaap, Dirk and more in a pastiche of Olympic-style sports with wacky twists! Pick up nitros in Formula 1, hit the satellite with your javelin, and slap opponents with your canoe paddle! You can even pole-vault over a dutch ditch and play a game of, what else, football! Rack up points for placement and gain the lead on your opponents to take home the trophy!
